name: Timothy's Epic Adventure In The Desert
name_original: Timothy's Epic Adventure In The Desert
description:
Probably the most ambitious project I had for a jam of 72 hours, this game is a top down 2d shooter with roguelike elements (and with that I mean weapons with randomized stats and random loot from enemies). And there's also a boss with a terrible name.

I know that sometimes it's difficult to swap weapons, but I'm too lazy to solve that.

Feel free to try the game, any feedback is always appreciated.

I'm sorry for mac users, but when I make the mac build with unity it just doesn't work and I don't understand why. I'm also too lazy to upload an html version.
